channel.title: pgsql on 后会有期
channel.description: Recent content in pgsql on 后会有期

item.title: thinkphp的pgsql模型execute方法bug
item.description: ThinkPHP/Library/Think/Db/Driver 目录下的Pgsql.class.php 的102行 代码如下： <?php public function execute($str) { $this->initConnect(true); if ( !$this->_linkID ) return false; $this->queryStr = $str; //释放前次的查询结果 if ( $this->queryID ) $this->free(); N('db_write',1); // 记录开始执行时

item.title: thinkphp的pgsql模型getLastInsId()获取上次插入的id的bug
item.description: hinkPHP/Library/Think/Db/Driver 目录下的Pgsql.class.php 的123行 代码如下 <?php /** * 用于获取最后插入的ID * @access public * @return integer */ public function last_insert_id() { $query = "SELECT LASTVAL() AS insert_id"; $result = pg_query($this-&gt;_linkID,$query); $arr = pg_fetch_array($result,null,PGSQL_ASSOC); //list($last_insert_id) = pg_fetch_array($result,null,PGSQL_ASSOC); pg_free_result($result);
